DOC.detailed_description: This study focus evaluation empowerment intervention develop person young onset dementia informal caregiver . This pragmatic cluster randomize control trial aim investigate ( 1 ) effectiveness intervention concern participant ' well-being , quality life , behavioral issue , ( 2 ) effect intervention informal caregiver ' sense competence perceive distress , ( 3 ) impact intervention healthcare cost . Furthermore , investigator aim study feasibility intervention frame implementation strategy . Participants intervention group receive intervention 5 month . Participants control group receive care usual .
